skills.skill: Azure Security and IAM Best Practices
Role Based Access Control (RBAC) or Attribute Based Access Control (ABAC)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and build Azure cloud, forward-thinking, Authentication, and Authorization solutions.
Leverage a large scope of Identity-related technologies both on-premises and in the cloud.
Design, document, and help train junior resources on new processes and technical solutions relevant to the space.
Work as a tier 3 support resource for the client-facing Platform team on all identity-related tasks.
Engage with the Security and Enterprise IT teams to stay aware and aligned on their initiatives in this space.
Interface closely with stakeholders and participate as a key stakeholder with internal teams to ensure the needs of the clients' Platform are addressed during new solution deployments.
Must have - strong background in Azure security and IAM best practices.
Must have - Ten plus years of experience working with an Azure Identity repository.
Must have - Eight plus years of experience working in a DevOps environment.
Must have - Expert level knowledge of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) or Attribute Based Access Control (ABAC).
Must have - Foundational knowledge of SAML and OIDC.
Must have - Engineering degree from accredited, 4 year university.

education_certification.credential: Engineering degree from accredited, 4 year university
